chat_messages.text: What causes rainbows to appear in the sky?

content.text: What causes rainbows to appear in the sky?

chat_messages.text: Rainbows are formed when sunlight passes through raindrops, which act as prisms and split the light into its different colors.

content.text: Rainbows are formed when sunlight passes through raindrops, which act as prisms and split the light into its different colors.

chat_messages.text: Many animals can perceive some colors but not all; they may not see rainbows in the same way humans do.

content.text: Many animals can perceive some colors but not all; they may not see rainbows in the same way humans do.
